top_articles.title: UK Sanctions Russian and Chinese Firms Suspected of Being ‘Malign Actors’ in Information Warfare
top_articles.summary: Britain and its allies face escalating “hybrid threats … designed to weaken critical national infrastructure, undermine our interests and interfere in our democracies.”

top_articles.title: Microsoft Patches 57 Vulnerabilities, Three Zero-Days
top_articles.summary: Microsoft has addressed a Windows vulnerability exploited as zero-day that allows attackers to obtain System privileges.

top_articles.title: SAP fixes three critical vulnerabilities across multiple products
top_articles.summary: SAP has released its December security updates addressing 14 vulnerabilities across a range of products, including three critical-severity flaws.

top_articles.title: Microsoft releases Windows 10 KB5071546 extended security update
top_articles.summary: Microsoft has released the KB5071546 extended security update to resolve 57 security vulnerabilities, including three zero-day flaws.

top_articles.title: Critical Apache Tika Vulnerability Leads to XXE Injection
top_articles.summary: The bug allows attackers to carry out XML External Entity (XXE) injection attacks via crafted XFA files inside PDF files.
